name: memory-manager
description: Persistent key-value memory storage using a local JSON file. Store, retrieve, search, list, and delete entries with automatic timestamping.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: memory_manager
toolDefinition.description: Manage persistent memory entries stored in a local JSON file. Store key-value pairs, retrieve by key, search with fuzzy matching, list all entries, or delete entries.

action.description: The memory operation to perform. 'store' saves a key-value pair, 'retrieve' gets by exact key, 'search' performs fuzzy matching on keys and values, 'list' shows all entries, 'delete' removes an entry by key.

key.description: The memory key. Required for 'store', 'retrieve', and 'delete' actions.

value.description: The value to store. Required for the 'store' action.

query.description: Search query for fuzzy matching keys and values. Required for the 'search' action.
